DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective tudy evaluate potential photoallergy sun care product Sun Protection Factor ( SPF ) 50 Y65 110 , SPF 50 Y51 002 , SPF 15 V27 104 application compare negative control ( 0.9 % sodium chloride , NaCl ) follow irradiation UV A UVB . DOC.brief_title: To Test Photo Allergy Reaction Sunscreens
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 65 good general health Fitzpatrick skin type I IV Females ( childbearing potential ) acceptable measure contraception Willing follow study rule , include : sun exposure ( example , swimming , sunbathing , tan bed ) , avoidance activity would cause excessive sweating , use lotion , cream , oil back area Willing change current brand personal care product soap , body wash , laundry detergent , body spray , body spritz , etc . participate study
